title: Update 1Password Skill to Use Environments Feature
description: Update the /1password skill to document the 1Password Environments feature (beta) as the PREFERRED approach for .env management. Environments is UI-based - user imports .env via 1Password app, then mounts to local path. CLI cannot create environments (beta limitation). songscript is already set up as reference.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add ENVIRONMENTS section to SKILL.md as PREFERRED approach (before Quick Actions)
Document UI setup flow: 1Password app → Developer → Environments → Create → Import .env
Document mount destination: Destinations tab → set path to .env.local → creates named pipe
Document limitation: CLI 'op env list' cannot see UI-created environments (beta)
Document that mounted file shows '# Generated by 1Password' header
Document that edits to mounted file are lost - must edit in 1Password UI
Update migrate-env.md: Environments (UI) first, CLI fallback for automation
Reference songscript as working example (9 vars, .env.local mounted)
Keep manual op item create as fallback for scripted/automated migrations
